hooks.command: file_path=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path // .path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$'; then npx eslint "$file_path" --format compact 2>/dev/null || true; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then ruff check "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.go$'; then golangci-lint run "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
